inclusion.criterion: Being diagnosed with MG by a neurologist
inclusion.label: unknown

inclusion.criterion: To be in Stage II or III according to the Clinical Classification of the Medialia Gravis Functional Assessment (MGFA)
inclusion.label: unknown

inclusion.criterion: The Mini Mental Test score should be over 24 in order to be cooperative to the physiotherapist's instructions
inclusion.label: unknown

inclusion.criterion: To volunteer to participate in the study
inclusion.label: met
inclusion.evidence: Patient volunteered to participate in the study

exclusion.criterion: Having a cognitive problem and having a Mini Mental Test score below 24
exclusion.label: does_not_trigger

exclusion.criterion: To have had myasthenic crisis in the last month
exclusion.label: unknown

exclusion.criterion: Modification of medical treatment and dose in the last month
exclusion.label: does_not_trigger
exclusion.evidence: Patient's therapy included field radiation t10-l1 followed by 11 cycles of temozolomide, but no recent modification mentioned

exclusion.criterion: Systemic, orthopedic and neurological disease in addition to the disease
exclusion.label: triggers
exclusion.evidence: Patient has anaplastic astrocytoma of the spine complicated by severe lower extremity weakness and urinary retention

notes: Unknown stage according to MGFA, unknown Mini Mental Test score. Patient's condition is more severe than myasthenia gravis.
